nodes.text: An Aqualish served as a farmhand to the Lothalian Morad Sumar. He served Sumar and his wife, Marida Sumar, until 4 BBY, when Yogar Lyste destroyed the farm. Lyste took the three captive, until Ezra Bridger and Garazeb Orrelios saved them, holding off the stormtroopers while the three retreated.
